data.communities: Published in The Perl Journal in 1997
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Back in '97 I called the module Math::TT800, but with the creation
    of the Math::Random hierarchy it seems to be preferrable to use that
    subtree.

    I will upload a pure perl implementation as TT800_PP as well.

    Why upload it to CPAN? Because I promised to do so in '97 and now I
    was approached to do so as some other author's module scheduled for
    CPAN upload depends on my TT800 module.

    /ol
